translation.en: We were coming out of the house.
translation.es: Estábamos saliendo de la casa.

translation.en: This is gonna be my car in the driveway.
translation.es: Este era mi auto en la entrada.

translation.en: And then the Ford Expedition drove past…
translation.es: Y luego la Ford Expedition pasó…

translation.en: And you could just see every seat was filled.
translation.es: se podía ver cada asiento ocupado.

translation.en: Crystal, Juan, and my son Justin
translation.es: Crystal, Juan y mi hijo Justin

translation.en: were getting in the car.
translation.es: estaban subiendo al auto.

translation.en: Get in the car, she popped the seat forward. I was like,
translation.es: Subí al auto, ella movió el asiento y dije:

translation.en: Scoot over. We're not hitting no main streets.
translation.es: Muévete, no iremos por calles principales.

translation.en: We're going three, four blocks up the road to 7- Eleven. Scoot over, sis. And, uh…
translation.es: Son tres o cuatro cuadras hasta el 7-Eleven. Muévete. Y…

translation.en: We didn't even make it past the end of the street.
translation.es: ni llegamos al final de la calle.

translation.en: I get right up here.
translation.es: Llego aquí.

translation.en: I look over, and he's standing there, right by the stop sign.
translation.es: Miro y está parado ahí, junto a la señal de alto.

translation.en: And the white Ford Expedition turns all the way around,
translation.es: Y la Ford Expedition blanca se da la vuelta,

translation.en: and he comes sliding back in, and he stops right here.
translation.es: regresa y se detiene aquí.

translation.en: I race this way,
translation.es: Acelero por aquí,

translation.en: and I stop to see what's going on with the kids.
translation.es: y me detengo a ver qué pasa con los chicos.

translation.en: As we came around I look over, there's a guy with a hooded sweater
translation.es: Al acercarnos, veo a un tipo de suéter y capucha

translation.en: with a gun, probably a foot and a half away from me.
translation.es: con un arma, probablemente a 45 centímetros de mí.

translation.en: I see the gun.
translation.es: Veo el arma.

translation.en: And he was moving his mouth, like, trying to work his way up to it.
translation.es: Y movía la boca, tratando de decir algo.

translation.en: Bang, bang, bang.
translation.es: Bang.

translation.en: And all the explosions, and the glass, the tires screeching.
translation.es: Y todas las explosiones, el vidrio, los neumáticos chirriando.

translation.en: We're getting several calls, more than four shots heard…
translation.es: Recibimos varias llamadas, cuatro disparos…

translation.en: The shots were fired, and, uh…
translation.es: Hubo disparos y…

translation.en: - They shot at you? - They were shooting at me.
translation.es: - ¿Le dispararon a tu auto? - Sí, así es.

translation.en: I just ducked down in the seat thinking, Oh, my God.
translation.es: Me agaché en el asiento y pensé: Dios mío.

translation.en: I don't even know if they hit the car.
translation.es: No sé si le dieron al auto.

translation.en: I looked over at my sister and she was just, like, motionless.
translation.es: Miré a mi hermana y estaba inmóvil.

translation.en: - What's the problem? - The car came just barreling in.
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el problema? El auto llegó derrapando.

translation.en: - It's a Honda Accord. And they came up-- - What color Honda?
translation.es: - Es un Honda Accord, y llegaron… - ¿Qué color?

translation.en: We made it to right in front of a grocery store,
translation.es: Llegamos a una tienda de comestibles,

translation.en: right in front of the doors.
translation.es: frente a las puertas.

translation.en: I got out of the car, and I picked her up, and I'm sitting there holding her.
translation.es: Salí del auto, la levanté y me senté sosteniéndola.

translation.en: Someone's been shot that's on the floor. It seems like she's not responding.
translation.es: Le dispararon a alguien que está en el piso. No responde.

translation.en: Address is…
translation.es: La dirección es…

translation.en: And I felt her head, and…
translation.es: Sentí su cabeza…

translation.en: RP's going to be responding. It looks like we have a victim.
translation.es: Apoyo está respondiendo. Parece que hay una víctima.

translation.en: Patrol, what's your twenty…?
translation.es: Patrulla, ¿su ubicación?

translation.en: God says, Ask and you shall receive.
translation.es: Dios dice: Pide y recibirás.

translation.en: I did.
translation.es: Eso hice.

translation.en: So where was he? He also says everything is according to his plan.
translation.es: ¿Dónde estaba? Dice que todo va de acuerdo a su plan.

translation.en: What kind of fucked- up plan is that?
translation.es: ¿Qué plan es ese?

translation.en: Where's the loving God in my life?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el Dios amoroso en mi vida?

translation.en: And I don't get it.
translation.es: Y no lo entiendo.

translation.en: I just want to know why, you know? Why?
translation.es: Solo quiero saber por qué, ¿sabes?

translation.en: It was midnight, and my grandma was in the living room crying.
translation.es: Era medianoche, mi abuela lloraba en la sala.

translation.en: And they said, Crystal's been shot.
translation.es: Dijeron: Le dispararon a Crystal.

translation.en: I said, Crystal's been shot? They said, Crystal's been shot in the head.
translation.es: Dije: ¿Le dispararon a Crystal?. Dicen: Le dieron en la cabeza.

translation.en: The first memory of Crystal I have,
translation.es: Mi primer recuerdo de Crystal,

translation.en: she liked to play baby dolls with me, and she would always ask me questions.
translation.es: le gustaba jugar a las muñecas conmigo y siempre me hacía preguntas.

translation.en: Oh, Jaimie, did Annabelle get her bottle? She would make, like…
translation.es: Jaimie, ¿le diste su biberón a Annabelle?. Me hacía…

translation.en: She would make my playtime fun.
translation.es: Hacía divertidos los juegos.

translation.en: And, uh, she really did. She opened my imagination.
translation.es: Así era. Me abrió la imaginación.

translation.en: She made sure that I knew that nothing's impossible.
translation.es: Se aseguró de que yo supiera que nada es imposible.

translation.en: Everything is possible.
translation.es: Todo es posible.

translation.en: And I went on MySpace.
translation.es: Y entré a MySpace.

translation.en: Tonight, a horrible tragedy has happened.
translation.es: Esta noche ocurrió una tragedia horrible.

translation.en: I blogged about that. That's how I got my emotions out.
translation.es: Escribí sobre eso. Así es como saqué mis emociones.

translation.en: I didn't cry at home.
translation.es: No lloré en casa.

translation.en: I just typed.
translation.es: Solo escribí.

translation.en: I just let my fingers go and… type away.
translation.es: Solo dejé que mis dedos escribieran.

translation.en: The very last sentence:
translation.es: La última oración:

translation.en: Crystal, please be okay. I love you more than life itself.
translation.es: Crystal, ojalá estés bien. Te amo más que a la vida.

translation.en: She didn't wake up.
translation.es: No despertó.

translation.en: I remember her being here and,
translation.es: Recuerdo que estuvo aquí,

translation.en: just expect her to… walk through the door again.
translation.es: y esperaba que volviera a entrar por la puerta.

translation.en: It's not going to happen.
translation.es: No va a pasar.

translation.en: When we think of our family and the good times, it's like,
translation.es: Al pensar en la familia y en los buenos tiempos, es como si hubiera una línea.

translation.en: there's a line drawn.
translation.es: es como si hubiera una línea.

translation.en: Before Crystal and after Crystal.
translation.es: Antes de Crystal y después de Crystal.

translation.en: She… She was just my pride and joy. I wanted a daughter so bad.
translation.es: Era mi orgullo y alegría. Quería tanto una hija.

translation.en: Had three sons.
translation.es: Tuve tres hijos.

translation.en: And so the fourth one it was like, Yay, got my little girl.
translation.es: Y con la cuarta fue como: Sí, tengo a mi pequeña.

translation.en: She was my sunshine. She was my life. My life. Yeah.
translation.es: Ella era mi sol, mi vida. Sí.

translation.en: She would do anything.
translation.es: Ella hacía todo.

translation.en: She loved heights and roller coasters, and she was so lucky at the casino.
translation.es: Amaba las alturas y las montañas rusas, y tenía suerte en el casino.

translation.en: She went to a machine and put five dollars in it,
translation.es: Iba a una máquina, le ponía cinco dólares

translation.en: and won $38,000.
translation.es: y ganaba $ 38 000.

translation.en: And started an air- conditioning heating business with her husband.
translation.es: Inició un negocio de calefacción y aire acondicionado con su esposo.

translation.en: They just took off with it.
translation.es: Les iba muy bien.

translation.en: And then her husband fell back to drug use and the violence.
translation.es: Luego su esposo volvió a las drogas y a la violencia.

translation.en: And so Crystal left him and was back with us.
translation.es: Crystal lo dejó y regresó con nosotros.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: Just so many memories. God, just so many memories.
translation.es: Hay tantos recuerdos. Dios, muchos recuerdos.

translation.en: A lot of good memories too, but that one night,
translation.es: Muchos buenos recuerdos también, pero esa noche,

translation.en: that's all it takes.
translation.es: fue todo.

translation.en: Yeah, same tattoo on the neck.
translation.es: Sí, mismo tatuaje en el cuello.

translation.en: We have a picture of a grim reaper that sits on the desk
translation.es: Tenemos una foto de una parca que va en el escritorio

translation.en: of the person who's next up.
translation.es: de la persona que sigue.

translation.en: It's like death is always kind of waiting,
translation.es: Como que la muerte siempre espera.

translation.en: and when you're at the top of the list, that's your case.
translation.es: Si estás al inicio de la lista, es tu caso.

translation.en: You have no idea what you're going to catch. And it was my turn.
translation.es: Así que no tienes idea de lo que vas a atrapar, y era mi turno.

translation.en: We've got a shooting over on the west end of the city,
translation.es: Hubo un tiroteo al oeste de la ciudad,

translation.en: so I get dressed, kiss my wife, drive in, and then your brain starts running.
translation.es: me visto, beso a mi esposa, manejo y el cerebro empieza a funcionar.

translation.en: My first murder case was a gang shooting. Those are always extremely difficult.
translation.es: Mi primer caso fue un tiroteo entre pandillas. Eso siempre es difícil.

translation.en: That one case, unfortunately, remains open right now.
translation.es: Ese caso, por desgracia, sigue abierto.

translation.en: There's still a guy out there that's gotten away with the ultimate crime.
translation.es: Hay un tipo que salió impune del peor crimen,

translation.en: I still think about it.
translation.es: y aún pienso en eso.

translation.en: Uh, my second one was the Crystal Theobald case.
translation.es: El segundo fue el caso de Crystal Theobald.

translation.en: I mean, I can't let two go. There's just no way that two are gonna go,
translation.es: No se me pueden ir dos. No pueden quedar libres.

translation.en: but it started off pretty rocky.
translation.es: Pero empezó bastante difícil.

translation.en: They had multiple casings at the scene,
translation.es: Había varios casquillos en la escena,

translation.en: right at the intersection of Greenpoint and Geranium.
translation.es: en la intersección de Greenpoint y Geranium.

translation.en: They had what might've been a shoe involved in it,
translation.es: Tenían algo que podía ser un zapato,

translation.en: so they identified that for us.
translation.es: así que lo identificaron.

translation.en: But I get a chance to see where evidence items are,
translation.es: Pude ver dónde están las piezas de evidencia,

translation.en: photographs and measuring of evidence, video.
translation.es: fotografías, las medidas, videos.

translation.en: I'm… My brain was flooded, especially being new in the unit.
translation.es: Mi cerebro se abrumó, era nuevo en la unidad.

translation.en: It's almost like overload.
translation.es: Era casi como una sobrecarga.

translation.en: Riverside Police Department.
translation.es: Policía de Riverside.

translation.en: They had witness statements. Gone door- to- door.
translation.es: Hubo declaraciones de testigos.

translation.en: We do what we call a canvass.
translation.es: Hicimos un sondeo.

translation.en: - You didn't hear any gunshots? - We were inside tonight.
translation.es: ¿No oyó disparos? Estábamos adentro.

translation.en: You didn't hear anything or see anything?
translation.es: - ¿No oyó o vio algo? - No estaba aquí.

translation.en: - I wasn't here. - No, I was asleep.
translation.es: - ¿No oyó o vio algo? - No estaba aquí. - No, estaba dormido. - ¿Dormido?

translation.en: You were asleep?
translation.es: - No, estaba dormido. - ¿Dormido?

translation.en: Anyone that might have either ear or eyeshot of the incident.
translation.es: Alguien que oyera o viera el incidente.

translation.en: You didn't hear any gunshots?
translation.es: ¿No oyó disparos?

translation.en: No. My wife said she heard, you know, several pops, yeah.
translation.es: No. Mi esposa dijo que escuchó varios disparos.

translation.en: She didn't see anything?
translation.es: ¿No vio nada?

translation.en: There were a couple of detectives who were at the hospital.
translation.es: Había un par de detectives en el hospital

translation.en: They're trying to talk to the family, but they're not being cooperative with the detectives.
translation.es: intentando hablar con la familia, pero no cooperaron con los detectives.

translation.en: I didn't like them. I didn't like them. Didn't…
translation.es: No me agradaron, no…

translation.en: Didn't like them one bit and… you know, so…
translation.es: No me agradaron nada, entonces…

translation.en: She wasn't exactly trusting of me. She didn't know who I was, and--
translation.es: No confiaba en mí. No sabía quién era y…

translation.en: I didn't call the police to help me if I had an issue.
translation.es: No llamaba a la policía si tenía un problema.

translation.en: I didn't. It wasn't the police I called.
translation.es: No lo hice. No llamé a la policía.

translation.en: They were coming at my family like we were the ones that did it.
translation.es: Atacaban a mi familia como si ellos fueran responsables.

translation.en: Threatening and telling my boys, I'll lock you up.
translation.es: Amenazaban a mis hijos: Te encerraré.

translation.en: You know, if we catch wind of… You know, that made me upset.
translation.es: Si nos enteramos de…. Y eso me molestó.

translation.en: They put me in handcuffs and throw me in the back of a cop car
translation.es: Me esposaron, me metieron a la patrulla

translation.en: and interrogate me for hours.
translation.es: y me interrogaron por horas.

translation.en: And I didn't get it, didn't understand.
translation.es: Y no entendí.

translation.en: Took the detectives and I told them, I said,
translation.es: Llevé a los detectives y les dije:

translation.en: My family had nothing to do with this.
translation.es: Mi familia no tuvo nada que ver con esto.

translation.en: You want them to know I'm doing everything I can to help. That's all I'm here for.
translation.es: Quería que supieran que quiero ayudar. Para eso estoy aquí.

translation.en: Whatever you got going on, unless it's pertinent to my case, I don't care.
translation.es: Tus asuntos, solo si son relevantes para el caso, no me importan.

translation.en: I'm here to try and solve this homicide for you and your family,
translation.es: Quiero intentar resolver el homicidio para tu familia,

translation.en: and to put somebody who killed Crystal away.
translation.es: y encerrar a quien mató a Crystal.

translation.en: So then, you know, we opened up a little more, but…
translation.es: Entonces nos abrimos un poco, pero…

translation.en: There's a lot of rumors running around as to what might've happened.
translation.es: Hay muchos rumores sobre lo que pudo haber pasado.

translation.en: What are you thinking is…?
translation.es: ¿Piensas que…?

translation.en: I'm thinking there's been a lot of gang problems with that, uh, 5150.
translation.es: Creo que hubo muchos problemas de pandillas con la… 5150.

translation.en: This is what we call the West End.
translation.es: Lo llamamos la orilla del oeste.

translation.en: This kind of loop is where the actual shooting took place,
translation.es: En este circuito fue el tiroteo,

translation.en: but even more so where 5150 claim territory.
translation.es: pero más aún, es territorio de la 5150.

translation.en: But there were also multiple other gangs, Black, Hispanic,
translation.es: También había otras pandillas: negras, hispanas,

translation.en: who laid claim to the same area.
translation.es: que reclamaban esa área,

translation.en: So there's turf wars, and guys that see each other. There'll be conflict.
translation.es: hay guerras de territorio y confrontaciones. Habrá conflicto.

translation.en: Rival Latino and Black gangs involved in drug trafficking…
translation.es: Pandillas rivales latinas y negras involucradas en narcotráfico…

translation.en: 5150 kind of came into existence for us in Riverside around 2003, give or take.
translation.es: Supimos de la 5150 en Riverside alrededor del 2003, más o menos.

translation.en: They tried to establish themselves and made some inroads
translation.es: Intentaron establecerse y se abrieron brecha

translation.en: into being a particularly violent and confrontational gang,
translation.es: como una pandilla particularmente violenta,

translation.en: graduating to assaults, to shootings, to then, uh, murdering three people
translation.es: haciendo asaltos, tiroteos, luego asesinando a tres personas

translation.en: within the city in the course of two and a half to three years.
translation.es: dentro de la ciudad en un lapso de dos a tres años.

translation.en: It was a very quick evolution.
translation.es: Fue una evolución muy rápida.

translation.en: We're in Riverside now.
translation.es: Estamos en Riverside.

translation.en: All kinds of shootings, and every night people will get stabbed, robbed.
translation.es: Todo tipo de tiroteos, cada noche acuchillan y asaltan a personas.

translation.en: As soon as people heard 5150, like, they got scared.
translation.es: En cuanto la gente oyó de la 5150, se asustó.

translation.en: You know, they said we were murderers. We're killers.
translation.es: Dijeron que éramos asesinos.

translation.en: Never once did I ever think that society would look at us like that.
translation.es: Nunca pensé que la sociedad nos vería así.

translation.en: Originally Riverside was, uh… It was kind of like an outcast from L.A.
translation.es: Originalmente, Riverside era un área marginada de L. A.

translation.en: All the people that couldn't afford to live in L.A. or in Orange County,
translation.es: Quienes no podían pagar Los Ángeles u Orange County

translation.en: they came out to Riverside.
translation.es: venían a Riverside.

translation.en: So a lot of, I would say poor people.
translation.es: Así que era mucha gente pobre.

translation.en: I don't think we ever even went to, like, the beach or Disneyland.
translation.es: Creo que nunca fuimos a la playa o a Disneylandia.

translation.en: Nothing like that ever.
translation.es: Nada de eso.

translation.en: We never experienced anything outside of, like, that area.
translation.es: Nunca experimentamos nada fuera de esa área.

translation.en: So we thought that that was life.
translation.es: Pensamos que así era la vida.

translation.en: Fifty- one, fifty, it was like me and my cousins or family members
translation.es: La 5150 era como mis primos y mi familia que se apoyaban.

translation.en: backing each other up. That was the whole motive.
translation.es: La 5150 era como mis primos y mi familia que se apoyaban. Ese era el motivo. Somos familia. Eso era todo.

translation.en: Like, we're family. That was it.
translation.es: Ese era el motivo. Somos familia. Eso era todo.

translation.en: We would all be out here. Nothing really happening.
translation.es: Estábamos aquí y no pasaba nada.

translation.en: We were all under 18 years old, you know.
translation.es: Todos teníamos menos de 18 años.

translation.en: When we were kids, uh, you know, everybody targeted us.
translation.es: Cuando éramos niños, todos nos atacaban.

translation.en: Give me a full description of this--
translation.es: Dame una descripción completa…

translation.en: He was young. He was young. He was a kid.
translation.es: Era joven, era un chico.

translation.en: - But if I see him, I will know him. - Okay.
translation.es: - Pero si lo veo, lo reconoceré. - Bien.

translation.en: Then there was more interviews and looking at pictures.
translation.es: Luego hubo más entrevistas y debía revisar fotos.

translation.en: This particular binder has got all the different gang members.
translation.es: Esta carpeta tiene a todos los pandilleros,

translation.en: And it kind of helps me to keep track of who's who in the zoo.
translation.es: y me ayuda a saber quién es quién en el zoológico.

translation.en: I do remember Belinda telling me the shooter had been a really young,
translation.es: Recuerdo que Belinda me dijo que el tirador era muy joven,

translation.en: almost white- looking Hispanic guy, like a real baby face.
translation.es: hispano casi blanco, como con cara de niño.

translation.en: She saw his face, and she'd absolutely be able to identify him.
translation.es: Vio su rostro y podría identificarlo con seguridad.

translation.en: Wouldn't be a problem.
translation.es: No sería un problema.

translation.en: This is the sketch that was drawn based off the information provided by Belinda.
translation.es: Este es el boceto que se hizo según la información que dio Belinda.

translation.en: I looked through annuals, yearbooks,
translation.es: Revisé anuarios,

translation.en: looking for people who are gang members
translation.es: buscando miembros de pandillas

translation.en: and have a current picture I can look at.
translation.es: y para tener una imagen.

translation.en: I'm talking with Belinda, I say, I got pictures I want you to look at.
translation.es: Le digo a Belinda: Tengo fotos que quiero que veas.

translation.en: She starts going through the pictures.
translation.es: Empieza a revisar las fotos.

translation.en: And she gets to a young kid.
translation.es: Ve a un joven.

translation.en: And she stops
translation.es: Y se detiene…

translation.en: and says, That's him.
translation.es: y dice: Es él.

translation.en: One day Detective Wheeler called and said that, uh,
translation.es: Un día, el detective Wheeler llamó y dijo que…

translation.en: they have somebody they think might be involved in it,
translation.es: tenían a alguien que podría haber estado involucrado

translation.en: and if they could drive me down there to get a look at him.
translation.es: y que podían llevarme allí para verlo.

translation.en: And she IDs him. That's him. That's the guy.
translation.es: Ella lo identifica. Es él. Ese es el tipo.

translation.en: You doing okay, dude?
translation.es: ¿Estás bien, amigo?

translation.en: We start pressing him on this case and ask him where he was,
translation.es: Lo presionamos y le preguntamos dónde estuvo,

translation.en: and he's given us a particular alibi as to where he was, who he was with.
translation.es: nos dio una coartada particular sobre dónde y con quién estuvo.

translation.en: I wasn't there.
translation.es: No estuve ahí.

translation.en: I know that you were, though. I got somebody who identified you.
translation.es: Sé que sí, alguien te identificó.

translation.en: I'm telling him, We're gonna check this out.
translation.es: Le digo: Lo vamos a corroborar.

translation.en: Don't lie. I'll find out if you're lying to me.
translation.es: No me mientas. Me enteraré si mientes.

translation.en: We were at my house, and then we went to his brother's girlfriend's house.
translation.es: Estábamos en mi casa, luego fuimos a la casa de la novia de su hermano.

translation.en: He's saying, I wasn't there.
translation.es: Dice: No estuve ahí.

translation.en: I was over at a friend's house. I was with a friend. You can call them.
translation.es: Estaba en casa de un amigo, pueden llamarlo.

translation.en: You can check with them. I get a couple of my partners
translation.es: Pueden corroborarlo. Y mandé a un par de compañeros a verificar su coartada.

translation.en: to go over and verify his alibi.
translation.es: Y mandé a un par de compañeros a verificar su coartada.

translation.en: And it's solid.
translation.es: Y es buena.

translation.en: Please!
translation.es: ¡Por favor!

translation.en: Let me go home!  Let me go gome.
translation.es: ¡Déjenme ir a casa!

translation.en: So now I'm starting to think, Uh- oh, I got a bad ID here?
translation.es: Y ahora pienso: ¿Tengo una identificación errónea?

translation.en: That's not a good start.
translation.es: No es un buen inicio.

translation.en: And we ended up sending him home.
translation.es: Y terminamos enviándolo a casa.

translation.en: They really didn't explain things to me well enough,
translation.es: No me explicaron bien las cosas,

translation.en: like you make one mistake and identify somebody that's not involved,
translation.es: cometes un error e identificas a alguien que no está involucrado,

translation.en: they can no longer use what you have to say when it comes to court.
translation.es: y ya no pueden usar tu testimonio en una corte.

translation.en: So that complicated the case for the detective.
translation.es: Eso complicó el caso del detective.

translation.en: You start off with a case very optimistic.
translation.es: Empiezas un caso siendo optimista.

translation.en: We'll handle this. This is gonna get done.
translation.es: Nos encargaremos. Esto se hará.

translation.en: Then you reach a point to where there aren't any more leads,
translation.es: Luego llegas a un punto donde no hay más pistas,

translation.en: and… and now it's almost a war of attrition.

translation.es: o refutaba las pruebas que tenía, seguía insistiendo con:

translation.es: La policía realizó varias órdenes de cateo el miércoles.

translation.en: Somewhere in the neighborhood of 25 to 30 houses were hit all at the same time
translation.es: Entre 25 y 30 casas fueron revisadas a la misma hora

translation.en: on a particular morning.
translation.es: en una mañana en particular.

translation.en: This was a reign of terror, said the D.A.
translation.es: Era un reino de terror, dijo el fiscal.

translation.en: I think we took the gang apart on Wednesday.
translation.es: Desmantelamos a la pandilla el miércoles.

translation.en: The guys that were working the intel for Julio Heredia
translation.es: Los tipos que investigaban a Julio Heredia

translation.en: called and said, We've got a line on where he's at.
translation.es: llamaron y dijeron: Sabemos dónde está.

translation.en: Julio woke up one day surrounded with cops.
translation.es: Julio se despertó un día rodeado de policías.

translation.en: And they were Mexican cops.
translation.es: Eran policías mexicanos.

translation.en: I'm wanting to say it was within a day. I think we got him up here.
translation.es: Creo que tomó un día traerlo.

translation.en: Today we take back our park, our streets, our neighborhood,
translation.es: Hoy recuperamos nuestro parque, nuestras calles, nuestro vecindario y parte de nuestra comunidad,

translation.en: and a part of our community and return it to the rightful owners.
translation.es: nuestro vecindario y parte de nuestra comunidad, y se los damos a sus legítimos dueños.

translation.en: There's no justice. Justice would be
translation.es: No hay justicia. La justicia sería que nos trajeran de regreso a Crystal.

translation.en: if they could find a way to bring Crystal back to us.
translation.es: La justicia sería que nos trajeran de regreso a Crystal.

translation.en: News vans rolled up. I was just, like, wow.
translation.es: Llegaron camionetas de noticias. Estaba sorprendida.

translation.en: Her engagement on social media gleaned information
translation.es: Su participación en redes sociales dio información

translation.en: that eventually helped lead police to arrests.
translation.es: que ayudó a la policía con los arrestos.

translation.en: We were notified the night before
translation.es: Nos avisaron la noche anterior

translation.en: that Julio Heredia had been charged with my daughter's murder,
translation.es: que Julio Heredia fue acusado del asesinato de mi hija

translation.en: and that he was in custody.
translation.es: y que él estaba bajo custodia.

translation.en: It was like, Thank you, Jesus. Thank you. They got him. They got him.
translation.es: Dije: Gracias, Jesús. Gracias, ya lo tienen.

translation.en: You're looking at a murder charge, and you're that…
translation.es: Enfrentarás un cargo de homicidio…

translation.en: Are you that confident? I'm looking at you.
translation.es: ¿Estás tan seguro? Te estoy viendo.

translation.en: I can tell you're not confident.
translation.es: No te ves seguro.

translation.en: No, I'm sure about this. I'm thinking about other things.
translation.es: No, estoy seguro, pienso en otras cosas.

translation.en: What are you thinking about? Anna?
translation.es: - ¿En qué piensas? - ¿Piensas en Anna?

translation.en: - That kid she's carrying? - Yup.
translation.es: - ¿En el bebé que lleva dentro? - Sí.

translation.en: There's a lot of stuff in your life right now.
translation.es: Amigo, están pasando muchas cosas en tu vida.

translation.en: How far along is she now?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto tiene?

translation.en: - Four months. - Four months?
translation.es: - Cuatro meses. - ¿Cuatro meses?

translation.en: - Little boy or little girl? Do you know? - No.
translation.es: - ¿Es niño o niña? ¿Ya sabes? - No.

translation.en: How is she doing?
translation.es: ¿Cómo está?

translation.en: She's good.
translation.es: Está bien.

translation.en: You got a four- month- old on the way.
translation.es: Tienes un bebé de cuatro meses en camino.

translation.en: Set the example and step up and be a man about this.
translation.es: Da el ejemplo y sé un hombre en relación a esto.

translation.en: You made a mistake. Everybody makes mistakes.
translation.es: Cometiste un error. Todos cometen errores.

translation.en: Some of them are bigger than others.
translation.es: Algunos más grandes que otros.

translation.en: But right here, right now is the chance for you to make a change.
translation.es: Pero, en este momento, tienes la oportunidad de cambiar.

translation.en: For you to be a different kind of a person, Julio.
translation.es: De ser una persona diferente, Julio.

translation.en: You want to sleep on it tonight?
translation.es: ¿Quieres pensarlo esta noche?

translation.en: No, I just want to… Yeah, I want a freaking lawyer.
translation.es: No, solo quiero… Sí, quiero un abogado.

translation.en: I want you to give me my rights. I want somebody to be right here.
translation.es: Quiero mis derechos. Quiero que alguien esté aquí.

translation.en: Now you want a lawyer? You can have an attorney if you want.
translation.es: ¿Quieres un abogado? Puedes tener uno si quieres.

translation.en: You wanna do that? That's fine.
translation.es: ¿Quieres hacerlo? Bien.

translation.en: - But now you got a lot to think about. - You don't understand me anyways.
translation.es: - Tienes mucho en qué pensar. - Ustedes no me entienden.

translation.en: I would describe Riverside as kind of the Wild West
translation.es: DESPACHO DEL DEFENSOR PÚBLICO Describiría a Riverside como el Viejo Oeste

translation.en: of the criminal justice system as far as here in Southern California.
translation.es: del sistema de justicia penal en el sur de California. Es un lugar intenso para ejercer la ley.

translation.en: An intense place to practice.
translation.es: en el sur de California. Es un lugar intenso para ejercer la ley.

translation.en: The DA's office, they have a reputation.
translation.es: La fiscalía tiene reputación.

translation.en: You know, we're aggressive about gang prosecutions.
translation.es: Somos agresivos al enjuiciar pandillas.

translation.en: So aggressive to the fact we're looking to put gang members to death.
translation.es: Tan agresivos que queremos matar a los pandilleros.

translation.en: You know, on our side we're representing Julio,
translation.es: De nuestro lado, representamos a Julio,

translation.en: and trying to convey his humanity and his interests,
translation.es: intentamos transmitir su humanidad e intereses.

translation.en: but they have to have a tough decision to a family who's lost somebody.
translation.es: Deben tomar una decisión difícil por una familia que perdió a alguien.

translation.en: Now we bring the family in,
translation.es: Ahora traemos a la familia,

translation.en: and we talk with the DA's office about if it'll be the death penalty.
translation.es: y hablamos con la fiscalía si habrá pena de muerte.

translation.en: I know Belinda was very, very passionate.
translation.es: Sé que Belinda estaba enardecida

translation.en: She wanted him to pay the ultimate price for it.
translation.es: y quería que pagara el precio máximo.

translation.en: Um, and I don't blame her. I don't blame her at all.
translation.es: Y no la culpo en absoluto.

translation.en: Yeah, I hate him. I hate him.
translation.es: Sí, lo odio.

translation.en: I do.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: There's… I can't think of anything in the world bad enough
translation.es: No se me ocurre nada en el mundo…

translation.en: that would be enough.
translation.es: que sea suficiente.

translation.en: Capital cases, your whole mind frame is changed to saving a person's life.
translation.es: En casos de pena de muerte, solo piensas en salvar a esa persona.

translation.en: So that person's entire life has to be investigated
translation.es: La vida de esa persona debe ser investigada

translation.en: because ultimately, you're not just killing
translation.es: porque, al final, no solo matas

translation.en: that part of the person that committed the crime. You're killing all of them.
translation.es: a la persona que cometió el crimen, sino a todos.

translation.en: Their story has to be told. How they got to where they were.
translation.es: Hay que contar su historia. Cómo llegó a donde está.

translation.en: You know, not excuses but explanations.
translation.es: Sin excusas, solo explicaciones.

translation.en: He was so small in this picture.
translation.es: Estaba pequeño en esta foto.

translation.en: He was so tiny.
translation.es: Era muy pequeño.

translation.en: His big, old ears.
translation.es: Sus orejas grandes.

translation.en: I remember them sending us out.
translation.es: Recuerdo que nos enviaron…

translation.en: The papers that we have to fill out, like if you're 18 and older,
translation.es: HERMANA DE JULIO HEREDIA los papeles que debemos llenar, si tienes 18 años o más,

translation.en: and if you want to go to the execution, you can.
translation.es: y si quieres ir a la ejecución, puedes ir.

translation.en: Oh, my mom.
translation.es: Mi mamá.

translation.en: It was hard living with my mom.
translation.es: Fue difícil vivir con mi mamá.

translation.en: You know, she was on drugs and alcohol, and…
translation.es: Ella consumía drogas y alcohol…

translation.en: I mean, I would pick stuff up off the floor, eating it
translation.es: Yo recogía cosas del piso, me las comía,

translation.en: 'cause we were so hungry.
translation.es: porque teníamos mucha hambre.

translation.en: So that brings… Seeing this picture brings back a lot of bad memories.
translation.es: Eso trae… Ver esta foto trae muchos malos recuerdos.

translation.en: We didn't have food. We didn't have furniture.
translation.es: No teníamos comida ni muebles.

translation.en: Julio, he had to take care of all of us, getting money, working.
translation.es: Julio tenía que cuidarnos a todos, conseguir dinero, trabajar.

translation.en: For me, the only father figure I ever had was Julio.
translation.es: La única figura paterna que tuve fue Julio.

translation.en: You know, with Julio, we looked up to him.
translation.es: A Julio lo admiramos, ¿sabes?

translation.en: We wanted to be like him. We would dress like him.
translation.es: Queríamos ser como él, nos vestíamos como él.

translation.en: You know, we were proud.
translation.es: Estábamos orgullosos.

translation.en: We would go to school, and we'd tell everybody, That's our cousin.
translation.es: Íbamos a la escuela, le decíamos a todos: Es nuestro primo.

translation.en: This is where we lived up here, and he lived over there across the street.
translation.es: Vivíamos aquí arriba, y él vivía allá al otro lado de la calle.

translation.en: That was his last spot where, like, he actually, like, lived with his mom.
translation.es: Ese fue el último lugar donde vivió con su mamá.

translation.en: Uh, Julio was 14, 15, then.
translation.es: Julio tenía 14 o 15 años.

translation.en: I think he couldn't accept that his mom just didn't care to get them back.
translation.es: No podía aceptar que a su mamá no le importara recuperarlos.

translation.en: You know, she didn't try to get them back.
translation.es: No trató de recuperarlos.

translation.en: See, this picture just reminds me, like, of when they started,
translation.es: Esta foto me recuerda cuando empezaron

translation.en: you know, going out and getting involved in all that stuff.
translation.es: a salir y a involucrarse en todo eso.

translation.en: He started hanging out with the older guys.
translation.es: Se la pasaba con tipos mayores.

translation.en: And those are guys who would let him in his house. And they gave him drugs.
translation.es: Esos tipos lo dejaban entrar a su casa. Y le dieron drogas.

translation.en: And, you know, uh, they started having him do things
translation.es: Y empezaron a pedirle que hiciera cosas

translation.en: that he shouldn't have been doing.
translation.es: que no debería haber hecho.

translation.en: Oh, this has everybody in it.
translation.es: Aquí están todos.

translation.en: They all look so young in this picture.
translation.es: Todos se ven muy jóvenes en esta foto.

translation.en: This guy stabbed him with this huge kitchen knife.
translation.es: Este tipo lo apuñaló con un enorme cuchillo de cocina.

translation.en: And Julio's skinny, so the knife, like, came out his back.
translation.es: Julio es flaco, el cuchillo le salió por la espalda.

translation.en: That's when I started realizing he wasn't, um, the same anymore.
translation.es: Ahí fue cuando empecé a darme cuenta de que ya no era el mismo.

translation.en: Like, his joy was gone. It was, like, done, dead.
translation.es: Su alegría desapareció. Estaba acabado, muerto.

translation.en: Nick even said, Mom, I don't like this fucker.
translation.es: Nick dijo: Mamá, no me agrada ese maldito.

translation.en: He goes, Yeah, I fucking don't like him.
translation.es: Dice: Sí, no me gusta, carajo.

translation.en: But, Mom, you got to think, when I was 17, I didn't give a fuck.
translation.es: Pero, mamá, piensa que a los 17 años no me importaba nada.

translation.en: I was into sports.
translation.es: Hacía deportes.

translation.en: I mean, playing football and going to ride my dirt bike.
translation.es: Jugaba fútbol y andaba en mi bicicleta.

translation.en: And after Crystal was killed, I started having problems at school with fighting,
translation.es: Después de que mataron a Crystal, tenía peleas en la escuela,

translation.en: in a bad mood, and mad at the world, I guess I could say.
translation.es: andaba de mal humor, estaba enojado con el mundo, supongo.

translation.en: And he started messing up. He was angry. He wanted revenge.
translation.es: Y empezó a equivocarse. Estaba enojado. Quería vengarse.

translation.en: And we were losing him to a gang.
translation.es: Y lo perdimos por una pandilla.

translation.en: - Which son? - Nicholas.
translation.es: - ¿A quién? - Nicholas.

translation.en: Yeah, like, I was from a gang, and we were enemies with the 5150s and stuff.
translation.es: Sí, era de una pandilla, éramos enemigos con los 5150 y demás.

translation.en: I just fit in right with them.
translation.es: Y encajé bien con ellos.

translation.en: Like, fuck them fools too, you know? Like let's go look for them and…
translation.es: Decía que se fueran al diablo, que los buscáramos…

translation.en: Now I have the fear and worry about my son being killed in gang violence
translation.es: Ahora temo que mi hijo muera por violencia entre pandillas,

translation.en: and being a part of a gang, or killing somebody.
translation.es: que sea parte de una pandilla o mate a alguien.

translation.en: When I was a juvenile, I was arrested a lot.
translation.es: Y, cuando era joven, me arrestaron mucho.

translation.en: I mean, I have the gun case, then I'm up for assault with a firearm.
translation.es: Tengo el caso por portar arma, luego asalto con arma de fuego.

translation.en: That's what I got out of prison for, and it's just not worth it.
translation.es: Para eso salí de prisión  y no vale la pena.

translation.en: You stay in denial a little bit.
translation.es: Uno vive en negación.

translation.en: You don't wanna believe that your child… could do something like that. Get a gun.
translation.es: No quieres creer que tu hijo pueda hacer algo así. Traer un arma.

translation.en: I'm like, How did you get a gun? Where did you get a gun?
translation.es: Digo: ¿Cómo tienes un arma, de dónde la sacaste?.

translation.en: This was my bottom.
translation.es: Así toqué fondo.

translation.en: This…
translation.es: Esto…

translation.en: This was Belinda's wake- up call.
translation.es: Con esto despertó Belinda.

translation.en: I had to really start taking a good look at myself,
translation.es: Tuve que empezar a verme bien a mí misma

translation.en: and why I was having all of these… these feelings,
translation.es: y por qué tenía todos estos sentimientos.

translation.en: and just being pissed off at the world.
translation.es: Y por qué estaba enojada con el mundo.

translation.en: And… where is the anger coming from?
translation.es: ¿Y de dónde viene ese enojo?

translation.en: What… What is it I'm mad at?
translation.es: ¿Por qué estoy enojada?

translation.en: Well, I was mad at me. I was mad at me.
translation.es: Bueno, estaba enojada conmigo.

translation.en: I was disappointed in me.
translation.es: Estaba decepcionada de mí.

translation.en: Who's that? You guys, get down!
translation.es: ¿Quién es? Chicos, ¡agáchense!

translation.en: I think they're coming up the road again. Get behind the car, Ben. Hurry!
translation.es: Vienen de regreso. Ponte detrás del auto, Ben. ¡Rápido!

translation.en: Wait. Ma'am, hold on. Do you think he was a teenager?
translation.es: Espere, señora. ¿Cree que era un adolescente?

translation.en: The last day I used was the day Crystal was murdered.
translation.es: Tomé drogas por última vez el día que mataron a Crystal.

translation.en: Yeah. I was high.
translation.es: Sí. Estaba drogada.

translation.en: - He was shorter than me. - Thin, medium, heavy build?
translation.es: - Era más bajo que yo. - ¿Delgado, mediano, pesado?

translation.en: Oh gosh, uh…
translation.es: Cielos…

translation.en: And that's all Crystal ever wanted from me.
translation.es: Es todo lo que Crystal quería de mí.

translation.en: Mom, just get sober.
translation.es: Mamá, ponte sobria.

translation.en: My heart's still pounding. I'm just like, Oh my God. I can't believe this.
translation.es: Mi corazón sigue latiendo. Como: Dios, no puedo creerlo.

translation.en: And I couldn't do it for her. I couldn't do it for her in life.
translation.es: Y no pude hacerlo por ella cuando estaba viva.

translation.en: I have to learn to forgive myself.
translation.es: Debo aprender a perdonarme.

translation.en: And that's harder than forgiving… Julio Heredia.
translation.es: Y eso es más difícil que perdonar a Julio Heredia.

translation.en: It really is.
translation.es: Realmente lo es.

translation.en: I had to say that.
translation.es: Tenía que decir eso.

translation.en: Just memorials of all the murders in Riverside County.
translation.es: SE OIRÁ LA VOZ DE LA VÍCTIMA …los asesinatos en el condado de Riverside.

translation.en: Every single day, it's on the news.
translation.es: Todos los días salen en las noticias.

translation.en: It's just the names are changing.
translation.es: Solo cambian los nombres.

translation.en: I can understand where the drugs, gangs,
translation.es: Entiendo que fueron las drogas, las pandillas,

translation.en: and they were all high as a kite that night too.
translation.es: y todos estaban drogados esa noche.

translation.en: I can actually say, There go I, but for the grace of God.
translation.es: Puedo decir: Aquí voy, pero por la gracia de Dios.

translation.en: That was really the reason that we asked him to take the death penalty off the table.
translation.es: Esa fue la razón por la que le pedimos que retirara la pena de muerte.

translation.en: I did the right thing for the first time in my life.
translation.es: Hice lo correcto por primera vez en mi vida.

translation.en: I did the right thing. Yeah.
translation.es: Hice lo correcto. Sí.

translation.en: If you've got gang members that are definitely loyal to their gang
translation.es: Si tienes pandilleros que son leales a su pandilla

translation.en: and know the price that they pay if they snitch,
translation.es: y saben el precio a pagar por hablar,

translation.en: it's pretty rare that you get one, maybe two to be cooperative with us.
translation.es: es muy raro que consigas uno, tal vez dos que cooperen con nosotros.

translation.en: So that was huge.
translation.es: Eso era importante.

translation.en: By the time he hears the gunshot, he comes outside of the car.
translation.es: Cuando oye el disparo, sale del auto.

translation.en: He's coming out.
translation.es: Está saliendo.

translation.en: And at this time, I hear several other gunshot noises.
translation.es: Y en este momento oigo otros ruidos de disparos.

translation.en: I was kind of scared because of the fact that…
translation.es: Tenía miedo por el hecho de que…

translation.en: I know how many people are in this organization.
translation.es: sé cuántas personas hay en esta organización.

translation.en: And it's not something that you end.
translation.es: No es algo que puedas acabar.

translation.en: You've seen Little Huero on meth?
translation.es: - ¿Little Huero tomaba metanfetaminas? - Sí.

translation.en: - Yeah. - You've never smoked with him?
translation.es: - ¿Nunca fumaste con él? - Nunca.

translation.en: Never smoked with him, never seen him do it,
translation.es: - ¿Nunca fumaste con él? - Nunca. Nunca lo vi, sé que las consume

translation.en: but I know he's on it, his eyeballs are all opened up.
translation.es: Nunca lo vi, sé que las consume porque sus ojos están muy abiertos.

translation.en: It was just crazy to see them testifying against my brother, you know?
translation.es: Fue una locura verlos testificar en contra de mi hermano.

translation.en: 'Cause they grew up with us, you know?
translation.es: Porque crecieron con nosotros, ¿sabes?

translation.en: They were always there. They were always at our house.
translation.es: Siempre estaban ahí, en nuestra casa.

translation.en: So I saw when Little Huero dumped the first shot.
translation.es: Vi cuando Little Huero hizo el primer tiro.

translation.en: I didn't see the other shots. I saw the first one.
translation.es: No vi otros disparos, vi el primero.

translation.en: I did feel hurt, you know? Because we would hang out every day,
translation.es: Me sentí herido, ¿sabes? Porque nos veíamos todos los días

translation.en: and I just thought, for you to make up lies
translation.es: y pensé que solo inventaban mentiras

translation.en: just to get out of something.
translation.es: para salir de algo.

translation.en: Did you have interactions with them? Did they talk to you?
translation.es: ¿Tuviste interacciones con ellos? ¿Te hablaron?

translation.en: Not at all. They were just looking at me, but I didn't want to look at them.
translation.es: Para nada. Solo me miraban, pero no quería mirarlos.

translation.en: I think it was Manuel's crying, um, when he was testifying, so…
translation.es: Creo que Manuel estaba llorando cuando testificó, así que…

translation.en: I know he didn't mean to do all those things he did.
translation.es: Sé que no quiso hacer todo eso.

translation.en: Like how everyone in this world doesn't mean to do it.
translation.es: Así como todos en el mundo, no es su intención hacer algo.

translation.en: The comments that the judge made were really harsh.
translation.es: Los comentarios que hizo el juez fueron muy duros.

translation.en: Mr. Heredia is not a good person.
translation.es: El Sr. Heredia no es buena persona.

translation.en: He is a violent, cold- blooded murderer.
translation.es: Es un asesino violento a sangre fría…

translation.en: And he is going to pay for what he has done.
translation.es: y va a pagar por lo que ha hecho.

translation.en: We lived in the fast lane.
translation.es: Vivíamos al límite.

translation.en: We did things that you can't even think of.
translation.es: Hicimos cosas impensables.

translation.en: For those things, we get nightmares.
translation.es: Tenemos pesadillas por esas cosas.

translation.en: I live it every day. I can't… drive down the street where I grew up…
translation.es: Lo vivo todos los días. No puedo pasar por la calle donde crecí…

translation.en: without flashing back.
translation.es: sin recordarlo.

translation.en: I've had dreams about her, just…
translation.es: He soñado con ella, solo…

translation.en: I just hold tight to all my memories.
translation.es: Me aferro a todos mis recuerdos.

translation.en: It was about a month ago.
translation.es: Fue hace un mes.

translation.en: Crystal was standing there.
translation.es: Crystal estaba parada ahí.

translation.en: And she was in this white dress.
translation.es: Y traía un vestido blanco.

translation.en: And then I woke up.
translation.es: Luego me desperté.

translation.en: Now it's going to be difficult forgiving myself.
translation.es: Ahora será difícil perdonarme.

translation.en: Mom and Dad always try to protect me,
translation.es: Mamá y papá siempre tratan de protegerme.

translation.en: always try to have something good for me.
translation.es: Siempre tienen algo bueno para mí.

translation.en: And I'm… I'm trying not to let them down again.
translation.es: Intento no decepcionarlos de nuevo.

translation.en: I want to have kids. Raise a family.
translation.es: Quiero tener hijos. Criar una familia.

translation.en: You know, do something.
translation.es: Ya sabes, hacer algo.

translation.en: It was personal between William Sotelo and I.
translation.es: Era algo personal entre William Sotelo y yo.

translation.en: It's not over until he's apprehended.
translation.es: No se termina hasta que lo arresten.

translation.en: And I feel like I just need him in custody so Crystal can rest.
translation.es: Y siento que debe estar bajo custodia para que Crystal descanse.

translation.en: Let's see what William Sotelo…
translation.es: Veamos qué hay de William Sotelo…

translation.en: Oh, and Unity.
translation.es: Unidad.

translation.en: It shows me that wherever he is, he's not doing too badly.
translation.es: Me muestra que donde quiera que esté, no le va tan mal.

translation.en: This is beautiful. The High Priestess.
translation.es: Es hermoso. La Suma Sacerdotisa.

translation.en: Now this would represent me.
translation.es: Esto me representa.

translation.en: And it shows that I'm wise enough
translation.es: Muestra que soy lo suficientemente sabia para tomar los pasos necesarios

translation.en: to take the steps to move forward in my life.
translation.es: Muestra que soy lo suficientemente sabia para tomar los pasos necesarios y seguir con mi vida.

translation.en: And I'm to listen to my intuition and have patience
translation.es: Le hago caso a mi intuición, tengo paciencia

translation.en: and consider carefully what I want before I act.
translation.es: y considero cuidadosamente lo que quiero antes de actuar.

translation.en: And then the Justice card.
translation.es: Y luego la carta de la Justicia.

translation.en: He's ours. They're going to get him one day.
translation.es: Es nuestro. Lo atraparán algún día.

translation.en: Better times are coming.
translation.es: Vienen épocas mejores.

translation.en: Yes.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: Justice and revenge.
translation.es: ¿Justicia y venganza?

translation.en: Yes, they are just about the same thing.
translation.es: Sí, son casi lo mismo.

translation.en: One means you can stay in the free world,
translation.es: Una significa que andas libre,

translation.en: and the other means you can go sit in the defendant's chair.
translation.es: y la otra, que estarás en la silla del acusado.

translation.en: And that's a line I almost crossed myself.
translation.es: Y esa es una línea que casi cruzo.
